name: helsinki-fullstack-course-part3
description: This repository is dedicated to part3 of Full Stack Open course by University of Helsinki. The part is about programming a server with NodeJS and Express.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../helsinki-fullstack-course/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../helsinki-fullstack-course-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: galaxxyz
